title: Call of Duty
description: The first Call of Duty. A brand new franchise was born here on out.

title: Call of Duty 2
description: The second Call of Duty. A huge improvement on the first one with much more love and thought.

title: Call of Duty 3
description: The third Call of Duty. The first COD that wasn't developed by Infinity Ward, because they realised that for better games they need more time. Therefore a new studio: 'Treyarch' was created

title: Call of Duty 4 / Modern Warfare
description: The fourth installment or Modern Warfare left the WW2 era behind and focussed on a more modern era of COD

title: Call of Duty - World At War
description: For the last time in a while, Treyarch stept in to make one more WW2 game and brought out an absolute masterpiece. With much passion, the studio created the first iteration of 'zombies' in their free time

title: Call of Duty - Modern Warfare 2
description: The sequel to COD4 to eventually turn out to be one of the best CODs of all time

title: Call of Duty - Black Ops
description: The start of a new series for Treyarch. WAW was already beloved but thanks to this game, Treyarch was well known after this. Expanding MP and zombies even further with a very good campaign.

title: Call of Duty - Modern Warfare 3
description: The end of the Modern Warfare trilogy. This was the time where Sledgehammer stepped in because this game was in trouble when in development. The studio showed what they were capable of doing and made a great Call of Duty

title: Call of Duty - Black Ops 2
description: The sequel to BO1, many will say that this is the moment where COD was at it's peek with another banger of a game.

title: Call of Duty - Ghosts
description: The first COD to be on next gen (Playstation 4), this is where the downfall of COD started altough MP had some unique and different experiences than normal. And we can't forget about Riley either.

title: Call of Duty - Advanced Warfare
description: The jetpack era have begon. The first official game that Sledgehammer studios created without a foundation left from other developers.

title: Call of Duty - Black Ops 3
description: Without a doubt the most favorite jetpack game out of them all with a beloved zombies, this game can be discribed in only 3 words ... Train go boom

title: Call of Duty - Infinite Warfare
description: Ironicly the most viewed trailer from all of the COD reveal trailers, but also one of the most disliked videos of all of humanity. Many players were done with the jetpack era so they didn't even give this game a chance so it's highly underrated.

title: Call of Duty - Word War II
description: The jetpack era is finally over and Activision went straight back to their roots with boots on the ground in a WW2 setting. The first half of the game's lifetime was a bit of a struggle. But the second half, Sledgehammer saw our reaction and fixed almost everything the game did wrong en eventually COD WW2 became one of the better Multiplayer Experiences. Don't forget about the iconic headquarters ofcourse.

title: Call of Duty - Black Ops 4
description: The most packed Zombies at launch until today, this game was supposed to be the best Zombies game out there with an epic conclusion to the storyline along with an all new Chaos storyline but we all know how that went ... also this game had no campaign, but instead had blackout rushed together in just a year and an overal alright Multiplayer experience with an interesting stim shot feature.

title: Call of Duty - Modern Warfare 2019
description: The first reboot of the series. Activision saw that COD was declining and what was a better way to get it back up there by going back to the good old days with a rebooted modern warfare trilogy. However, this is the point where COD left the classic COD systems and all new ones like the seasonall prestige, battle passes and item shops/stores ... along with free DLC

title: Call of Duty - Warzone
description: What started as a simple battle royale mode that was supposed to stick for just one year became a massive succes and is now the face of Call of Duty.

title: Call of Duty - Black Ops Cold War
description: Then came Cold War. Thanks to the pandemic development slowed down for this game, but with just 2 years of development they still made a banger of a game.

title: Call of Duty - Vanguard
description: Vanguard focussed on bringing back WW2 one last time and possibly forever, because MP was alright (better then MW2019 at least), the campaign also was alright but zombies was just laughable. Sledgehammer and Treyarch were just unlucky with this game because they couldn't do what they wanted and then this was the result.

title: Call of Duty - Modern Warfare 2 2022
description: Introducing COD 2.0 from this point on COD will change it's development forever. With an all new unified engine for every game going forward. This game had a great campaign, but a very bad multiplayer and a abanded spec ops

title: Call of Duty - Modern Warfare 3 2023
description: The direct sequel to MW2 2022 it follows up the story but know it was made by Sledgehammer instead and the gameplay chances are amusing but has a very bad campaign.

title: Call of Duty - Black Ops 6
description: Currently not mutch is known, but Black Ops 6 is set to be very succesfull with a classic campaign, a pakt multiplayer with omnidirectional movement and finaly a good zombies ever since BO4

title: Call of Duty - Modern Warfare Remastered
description: A remastered version of the game where COD trully took off. Also because hated Infinite Warfare so mutch.

title: Call of Duty - Modern Warfare 2 Campaign Remastered
description: A remastered version of the iconic campaign from the OG Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2

title: Call of Duty - Warzone 2.0
description: With COD 2.0 introduced within Modern Warfare II 2022 came an all new Warzone experience that replaced the original Warzone (Caldera)

title: Call of Duty - Mobile
description: COD mobile can be described as the perfect COD, 'cause it is a mix of every game ever introduced with all of their best features and maps.

title: Call of Duty - Online
description: Call of Duty Online or better called COD China was essentialie COD, but specificly for China because they have very different gaming rules then other countries.

title: Call of Duty - Warzone Mobile
description: With warzone being a staple since 2019, Activision had to use this to their advantage and expand the battle royale even more by introducing it to mobile.
